TopicTitle: Suggestion: [VAB] build fairing option from parts manager

Articles.Content:
currently the only way to edit the fairing is by clicking the wrench icon when hovering over the fairing part
sometimes its pretty difficult to get that little wrench icon

2 hours ago, spaceman42069 said:

currently the only way to edit the fairing is by clicking the wrench icon when hovering over the fairing part
sometimes its pretty difficult to get that little wrench icon

That has already been reported in the bug report sub forum. Its definitely an issue.
